structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Criteria to be met by clients.
law.text:
A client shall meet the following criteria:
Be ambulatory or mobile nonambulatory, unless due to a temporary condition; and
Not be a danger.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 36, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 6, effective July 14, 2000.
